results.title: Grilled Short Ribs with Sesame-Chipotle Mole

steps.step: Pulse almonds and sesame seeds in a food processor until finely chopped.
Add red peppers, chipotle chiles, and vinegar and puree until well combined; season mole with salt.
Prepare a grill for medium-high heat; lightly oil grate. Season short ribs with salt and pepper and toss on a rimmed baking sheet with 1/3 cup mole; set remaining mole aside for serving.
Grill short ribs, turning occasionally, until charred on all sides and an instant-read thermometer inserted into the thickest part of meat registers 130F for medium-rare, 810 minutes.
Transfer short ribs to a cutting board and let rest 10 minutes. Thinly slice ribs against the grain and serve with reserved mole alongside.

ingredients.name: boneless beef short ribs
ingredients.original: 1 1/2 pounds boneless beef short ribs (1 1/4 - 1 1/2" thick)
ingredients.originalString: 1 1/2 pounds boneless beef short ribs (1 1/4 - 1 1/2" thick)

ingredients.name: canned chipotle chiles in adobo
ingredients.original: 2 canned chipotle chiles in adobo, seeded
ingredients.originalString: 2 canned chipotle chiles in adobo, seeded
ingredients.originalName: canned chipotle chiles in adobo, seeded

ingredients.name: roasted red peppers
ingredients.original: 1 cup roasted red peppers from a jar, preferably piquillo, drained
ingredients.originalString: 1 cup roasted red peppers from a jar, preferably piquillo, drained

results.title: Roasted Lemon Almond Cornish Hens {Slow Cooker}

steps.step: Slice one lemon; place 2 to 3 slices in the cavity of each hen.
Place one teaspoon minced thyme and 1 clove of mince garlic in each cavity.
Place hens in slow cooker.Juice 1 lemon; mix lemon juice, butter, remaining garlic and thyme, salt and pepper and drizzle over hens.
Sprinkle with 1/4 cup almonds.Cover and cook on low 8 to 10 hours (4 to 6 on high). If desired, baste hens with juices throughout the time.Arrange cooked hens on a serving platter.
Serve with remaining lemon slices and garnish with remaining almonds.

ingredients.name: almonds
ingredients.original: 1/2 cup slivered or sliced almonds, toasted and divided
ingredients.originalString: 1/2 cup slivered or sliced almonds, toasted and divided
ingredients.originalName: slivered or sliced almonds, toasted and divided

ingredients.original: 1/2 cup slivered or sliced almonds, toasted and divided

results.title: Sumac Roasted Salmon with Almond Gremolata and Horseradish Cream

steps.step: To make horseradish sour cream, whisk together sour cream, horseradish, lemon juice and chives. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Can be made 3 days ahead of time.Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.

Place salmon on a foil lined baking sheet and rub with 1 tablespoon olive oil. Season with salt, pepper and sumac.Roast salmon for 12-15 minutes or until desired doneness. Finish with a squeeze of lemon juice and a drizzle of olive oil.While the salmon is roasting, combine the gremolata ingredients together in a small bowl. Store leftovers in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.]
Serve salmon with horseradish sour cream and parsley almond gremolata

ingredients.name: almonds
ingredients.original: ¼ cup salted almonds, chopped (you can sub in another nut like walnuts)

results.title: Asian Pesto Stuffed Chili Glazed Salmon

steps.step: Preheat oven to 350FSlice salmon filets down the middle, leaving a couple of inches at the end intact so that the filet folds open like a book.Put garlic, Thai basil, and almonds in the bowl of a food processor and pulse to chop finely and combine.With machine running, pour oils into the feed tube.Season with Sea Salt and a generous pinch of crushed red pepper flakes.Press a generous layer of the pesto onto the bottom half of the salmon filet to cover.Fold the top half over the pesto.
Place the filets in a lightly oiled oven proof ceramic dish.
Brush the chili sauce generously over the top of the fish and place in oven
Bake for 20 minutes

ingredients.name: canola oil
ingredients.original: 1/3 cup Canola, Olive and Grapeseed Oil Blend (could also use Peanut Oil)
ingredients.originalString: 1/3 cup Canola, Olive and Grapeseed Oil Blend (could also use Peanut Oil)
ingredients.originalName: Canola, Olive and Grapeseed Oil Blend (could also use Peanut Oil)

ingredients.name: sweet chili sauce
ingredients.original: 1/8 cup Sweet Chili Sauce (available at Asian Markets)
ingredients.originalString: 1/8 cup Sweet Chili Sauce (available at Asian Markets)
ingredients.originalName: Sweet Chili Sauce (available at Asian Markets)

ingredients.name: thai basil
ingredients.original: 1 cup loosely packed Thai Basil, leaves and flowers, stems removed
